00014 #if ! defined(_Apoxi_AuxExtensions_DualFilterProvider_hpp)
00015 #define _Apoxi_AuxExtensions_DualFilterProvider_hpp
00019 
00020 #include <Auxiliary/FilterProvider.hpp>
00021 
00022 class DataItem;
00023 class FilterRule;
00024 
00028 /* NOTE: No writing is possible on a DualFilterProvider. Use <em>GetChildRow</em> to get
00029 the row of the child provider and update the child provider directly.
00030 See also: <em>Provider, DataItem, FilterRule</em>.*/
00031 class DualFilterProvider : public FilterProvider
00032 {
00033     typedef FilterProvider Base;
00034     public:
00035 
00036         enum FilterOperator {
00037             AndFilterOp,                // includes rows, where both rules matches
00038             OrFilterOp,                 // includes rows, where at least one rule match
00039             XorFilterOp,                // includes rows, where the first or the second, but not both rules matches
00040             FirstAndNotSecondFilterOp,  // includes rows, where the first but not the second rule match
00041             NotFirstAndSecondFilterOp,  // includes rows, where the not the first but the second rule match
00042             FirstOrNotSecondFilterOp,   // includes rows, where the first or not the second rule match
00043             NotFirstOrSecondFilterOp    // includes rows, where the not the first or the second rule match
00044         };
00045 
00048         DualFilterProvider();
00049 
00055         DualFilterProvider(Provider * provider, FilterRule * fst_rule, FilterRule* snd_rule,
00056                             INT fst_columnid = 0, INT snd_columnid = 0, FilterOperator op = AndFilterOp, 
00057                             BOOLEAN negation = FALSE);
00059         virtual ~DualFilterProvider();
00060 
00062         void Init(Provider * provider, FilterRule * fst_rule, FilterRule* snd_rule,
00063                     INT fst_columnid = 0, INT snd_columnid = 0, FilterOperator op = AndFilterOp, 
00064                     BOOLEAN negation = FALSE);
00065 
00067         void SetSecondFilterColumn(INT filtercolumn) { m_snd_column = filtercolumn; }
00068 
00070         void SetSecondFilterRule(FilterRule * rule) { m_snd_rule = rule; }
00071 
00073         virtual BOOLEAN SetParameter(const DataItem &item);
00074 
00075     protected:
00076         virtual BOOLEAN IsRowFiltered(Provider* base_provider, INT row, BOOLEAN negate);
00077 
00078     private:
00079         INT             m_snd_column;
00080         FilterOperator  m_filter_op;
00081         FilterRule*     m_snd_rule;
00082 
00083 };
00084 
00086 #endif  // _Apoxi_AuxExtensions_DualFilterProvider_hpp
